info.name: AsianFanfics - Pale Purple Theme
info.description:
A custom theme for asianfanfics. Created by Deirdre. For questions and inquiries please go here. (Vote or subscribe!) How to Install:
  • Install Stylish
  • Change your theme to the default Blue Theme
  • Install the theme
Customization:
info.additionalInfo: • If you notice that when you're browsing the tags and it looks like this, it's because of a bug from AFF itself.
